name: UNITED STATES OLYMPIC & PARALYMPIC COMMITTEE
sampleDescriptions: Issues relating to the Ted Stevens Olympic & Amateur Sports Act of 1978; issues relating to anti-doping; issues related to visas, immigration; issues related to commemorative coins.
